info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 3:12PM MST until August 13 at 4:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 312 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Packsaddle Campground, Windy Point Campground, Dolan Springs, Chloride, Pierce Ferry Road, Stockton Hill Road, Antares Road,and New Kingman-Butler. The rain guage in Tipton Canyon has recorded a total of 1.06 inches of precipitation associated with these storms. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
